actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to release on behalf of the United States a condition in a deed conveying certain lands to the State of Maryland.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to release on behalf of the United States a condition requiring the use for public purposes in a deed conveying lands in Worcester County to the State of Maryland.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to release on behalf of the United States a condition in a deed conveying certain lands to the State of Maryland.
